name: List
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Topic
List
description: Topic::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more topics that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Gcloud::Pubsub::Project#topics to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more topics that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Gcloud::Pubsub::Project#topics to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of topics.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topics = pubsub.topics
if topics.next?
  next_topics = topics.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topics = pubsub.topics
if topics.next?
  next_topics = topics.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Pubsub
Topic
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all topics by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each topic, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all topics are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each topic by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topics = pubsub.topics
topics.all do |topic|
  puts topic.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topics = pubsub.topics
all_names = topics.all.map do |topic|
  topic.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
pubsub = gcloud.pubsub

topics = pubsub.topics
topics.all(request_limit: 10) do |topic|
  puts topic.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all topics. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each topic.
